#define _USE_MATH_DEFINES
#include "beastwrappers/beastlightwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beasttexturewrapper.h"
#include <math.h>

namespace beastmaya {

BeastLight::~BeastLight()
{
        if (!m_persistent) {
                // Remove it here or let it die with the scene
                BEAST_CALL(ILBDeleteLightSource(m_obj));
        }
}

void BeastLight::setPersistent( bool persistent )
{
        m_persistent = persistent;
}

void BeastLight::setTransform( ILBMatrix4x4& transform )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetLightTransform(m_obj, &transform));
}

void BeastLight::setColor( ILBLinearRGB& color )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetLightColor(m_obj, &color));
}

void BeastLight::setIntensity( float intensity )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetLightIntensity(m_obj, intensity));
}

void BeastLight::setCastShadows( bool castShadows )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetCastShadows(m_obj, castShadows));
}

void BeastLight::setExponentFalloff( float cutoff, float exponent, bool clampToOne )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetLightExponentFalloff(m_obj, cutoff, exponent, clampToOne));
}

void BeastLight::setMaxRangeFalloff( float cutoff, float exponent )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetLightMaxRangeFalloff(m_obj, cutoff, exponent));
}

void BeastLight::setPolynomialFalloff( float cutoff, float constant, float linear, float quadratic, bool clampToOne )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetLightPolynomialFalloff(m_obj, cutoff, constant, linear, quadratic, clampToOne));
}

void BeastLight::setShadowRadius( float radius )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetShadowRadius(m_obj, radius));
}

void BeastLight::setSpotlightCone( float angle, float penumbraAngle, float penumbraExponent )
{
        if (angle + 2 * penumbraAngle > 2.0f * float(M_PI)) {
                penumbraAngle = float(M_PI) - angle / 2.0f;
        } else if (angle + 2 * penumbraAngle < 0) {
                penumbraAngle = -angle / 2.0f;
        }
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetSpotlightCone(m_obj, angle, penumbraAngle, penumbraExponent));
}

void BeastLight::setClippingPlanes( float nearDistance, float farDistance )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetClippingPlanes(m_obj, nearDistance, farDistance));
}

void BeastLight::setProjectedTexture( BeastTexture& texture )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetLightProjectedTexture(m_obj, texture.obj()));
}

void BeastLight::setSkylightTexture( BeastTexture& texture )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetSkyLightTexture(m_obj, texture.obj()));
}


void BeastLight::setShadowAngle( float angle )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetShadowAngle(m_obj, angle));
}

void BeastLight::setIntensityScale( float directScale, float indirectScale )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetIntensityScale(m_obj, directScale, indirectScale));
}

void BeastLight::setLightStats( ILBLightStatsMask stats, bool enable )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetLightStats(m_obj, stats, enable?ILB_LSOP_ENABLE:ILB_LSOP_DISABLE));
}

}
